mapper.select:
select * from t_streaming_configuration where is_delete='n'
and company_id=#{companyid}
and programme_num like CONCAT('%',#{programmeNum},'%')
order by id desc
mapper.update: update t_streaming_configuration set is_delete='y' where id=#{id}
